verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5927><s%>, When thou lightest the lamps <S%H5216><s%>, the seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> shall give light <S%H215><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H5927><s%>; he lighted the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof so as to give light in front <S%H4136><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And this was the work <S%H4639><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, beaten <S%H4749><s%> work of gold <S%H2091><s%>; unto the base <S%H3409><s%> thereof <S%H6525><s%>, and unto the flowers thereof <S%H4749><s%>, it was beaten work: according unto the pattern <S%H4758><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had showed <S%H7200><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so he made <S%H6213><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Take <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and cleanse them <S%H2891><s%>.

And thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto them <S%H2891><s%>, to cleanse them <S%H5137><s%>: sprinkle the water <S%H4325><s%> of expiation <S%H2403><s%> upon them <S%H8593><s%>, and let them cause a razor to pass over all their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> their clothes <S%H899><s%>, and cleanse themselves <S%H2891><s%>.

Then let them take <S%H3947><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and its meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>; and another <S%H8145><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And thou shalt present <S%H7126><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and thou shalt assemble <S%H6950><s%> the whole <S%H6950><s%> congregation <S%H4150><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

and thou shalt present <S%H7126><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>. And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the Levites <S%H3881><s%>:

and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall offer <S%H5130><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%>, on the behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that it may be theirs to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>: and offer <S%H6213><s%> thou the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the Levites <S%H3881><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H5975><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and offer <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Thus shalt thou separate <S%H914><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the Levites shall be mine <S%H3881><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> that shall the Levites <S%H3881><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> to do the service <S%H5647><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and thou shalt cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them <S%H5130><s%>, and offer them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%>.

For they are wholly given <S%H5414><s%> unto me from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; instead of all that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%>, even the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, have I taken them unto me <S%H3947><s%>.

For all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are mine <S%H120><s%>, both man and beast <S%H929><s%>: on the day <S%H3117><s%> that I smote <S%H5221><s%> all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I sanctified them for myself <S%H6942><s%>.
And I have taken <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And I have given <S%H5414><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as a gift <S%H5414><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; that there be no plague <S%H5063><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> come nigh <S%H5066><s%> unto the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: according unto all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> touching the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel unto them <S%H3478><s%>.

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> purified <S%H2398><s%> themselves from sin <S%H3526><s%>, and they washed their clothes <S%H899><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> offered <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> made atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them to cleanse them <S%H2891><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> that went <S%H935><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in to do <S%H5647><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>: as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> concerning the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, so did they unto them <S%H6213><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

This is that which belongeth unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: from twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> they shall go in <S%H935><s%> to wait <S%H6633><s%> upon the service <S%H5656><s%> in the work of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>:
and from the age <S%H1121><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they shall cease <S%H7725><s%> waiting <S%H6635><s%> upon the work <S%H5656><s%>, and shall serve no more <S%H5647><s%>,

but shall minister <S%H8334><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%>, and shall do <S%H5647><s%> no service <S%H5656><s%>. Thus shalt thou do <S%H5647><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> touching their charges <S%H4931><s%>.
